Hello,

I am trying to run heritrix 2.0 in an embedded application.  I am
c=
urious if anyone has done this before and can point me to a guide to
do the=
 following:
1) configure the crawl
2) start the crawl
3) stop the crawl
4) =
resume the crawl from a checkpoint

Since this is in an embedded applicatio=
n I am not going to use the UI.

Also, if anyone has any information on how=
 to get the URL data that
would be helpful.  I have seen a Nutch plugin, ha=
doop, that handles
the url duplication issue through the mapreduce algorith=
m.  Has anyone
successfully implemented Heritrix as an embedded application=
 and if so
please point me to some information so I can do the same.

Thank=
s in advance,
Bob
